nodes.text: The Ossiki Confederacy Army was one of the primary military groups from the planet Toydaria.

One of several such armies which protected individual cities and clans, the Ossiki Confederacy Army was a regular participant in the seasonal wars fought among the Toydarians. They were infamous for their use of chemical weapons which destroyed the food stocks of their enemies. A former leader once declared, "If we can't have it, no one can." Watto was once a member of the Confederacy.
